งัวเงีย

String.Source: A Drowsy Pet will prefer to sleep and stay asleep.
String.Dest: สัตว์เลี้ยงที่รู้สึกงัวเงียจะอยากนอนหลับแล้วหลับใหลไปเลย

String.Source:
A Hyper Pet will play, chase and scratch more frequently, even run around frantically.
Exercise and Play will calm down a Hyper Cat.
String.Dest:
สัตว์เลี้ยงที่รู้สึกดีดเด้งจะเล่นสนุก ขับไล่ และข่วนบ่อยกว่าปกติ แถมยังชอบวิ่งไปทั่ว
การออกกำลังกายและเล่นสนุกจะทำให้แมวดีดเด้งสงบสติลงได้

String.Source: Songs written and sung by the same person
String.Dest: เพลงที่ถูกแต่งและร้องโดยบุคคลเดียวกัน
เพลงแต่งเองร้องเอง

String.Source: Old and new alike, billboards say "Look Here!"
String.Dest: ป้ายประกาศเก่าๆ ที่ดูเหมือนใหม่ และเขียนข้อความไว้ว่า "มองตรงนี้สิ!"
ป้ายประกาศ มองฉันสิ

String.Source: Signs are used for a variety of purposes, to show of a business or to mark something important.
String.Dest: ป้ายต่างๆ มีจุดประสงค์ในการใช้งานมากมาย: หนึ่งคือทำให้ธุรกิจเป็นที่รู้จัก หรือสอง ทำให้บางอย่างเด่นชัดขึ้นมา
Signs Mark The Spot

String.Source: A little bit of decoration on the top and a nice cut out on the bottom, these signs are quick to capture the attention of any reader.
String.Dest: A little bit of decoration on the top and a nice cut out on the bottom, these signs are quick to capture the attention of any reader.
Texted and Trellised

String.Source: Icons are sometimes the most universal symbols to say "We're here to help". These signs convey in one simple image that this vet clinic cares about your pets.
String.Dest: บางครั้งรูปบนป้ายก็เป็นสัญลักษณ์สากลที่ทุกคนเข้าใจตรงกันว่า "พวกเราพร้อมช่วยเหลือ" ป้ายเหล่านี้จึงใช้เพียงรูปง่ายๆ รูปเดียวเพื่อสื่อว่าคลินิกสัตว์แห่งนี้จะดูแลและใส่ใจสัตว์เลี้ยงของคุณ
สัตวแพทย์ + หัวใจ + สัตว์เลี้ยง

String.Source: Have a pet in your household
String.Dest: มีสัตว์เลี้ยงในครัวเรือนของคุณ

String.Source: Add a pet to your family in Create a Sim, Adopt a pet through the computer, or adopt a pet through the Phone.
String.Dest: เพิ่มสัตว์เลี้ยงเข้าครอบครัวของคุณในโหมดสร้างซิม รับเลี้ยงสัตว์เลี้ยงผ่านทางคอมพิวเตอร์ หรือรับเลี้ยงสัตว์เลี้ยงผ่านโทรศัพท์
Be Friends with {1.Number} {S1.Animal}{P1.Animals}

String.Source: Run friendly socials on your pet in order to raise your relationship.
String.Dest: ทำคำสั่งสังคมหมวดเป็นมิตรกับสัตว์เลี้ยงของคุณเพื่อเพิ่มระดับความสัมพันธ์
ทำตัวเป็นมิตรกับสัตว์ {1.Number} ครั้ง

String.Source: Click on a pet and do friendly interactions with them.
String.Dest: คลิกที่สัตว์เลี้ยงแล้วทำคำสั่งหมวดเป็นมิตรกับพวกมัน
เป็นสหายกับสัตว์ {1.Number} ตัว

String.Source: After raising your relationship with a pet to sufficient levels you can become a companion with them through an interaction.
String.Dest: หลังจากเพิ่มระดับความสัมพันธ์กับสัตว์เลี้ยงไปถึงระดับนึงแล้ว คุณจะสามารถเป็นสหายกับน้องได้โดยใช้คำสั่ง
ขัดเกลาพฤติกรรมไม่ดีสำเร็จ {1.Number} ครั้ง

String.Source: Sometimes your pets do naughty things. Click on them and scold or lecture them about it. Eventually they'll learn and no longer perform such insolent behavior.
String.Dest: บางครั้งสัตว์เลี้ยงของคุณก็ทำเรื่องซุกซน ให้คลิกที่สัตว์เลี้ยงเพื่อตำหนิหรือสอนเกี่ยวกับพฤติกรรมนั้น ในท้ายที่สุดพวกมันจะได้เรียนรู้และไม่ทำพฤติกรรมเลวร้ายซ้ำอีก
สัมผัสถึงความรัก {1.Number} ครั้ง

String.Source: When you have achieved at the very least Good Friends status with a pet, you will be able to Feel the Love with your furry friend.
String.Dest: เมื่อระดับความสัมพันธ์ของคุณกับสัตว์เลี้ยงไปถึง 'เพื่อนที่ดี' เป็นอย่างน้อยแล้ว คุณจะสามารถ 'สัมผัสถึงความรัก' กับเพื่อนขนปุยของคุณได้
เล่นกับวิญญาณสัตว์เลี้ยง {1.Number} ตัวที่ไม่ซ้ำกัน

String.Source: Find a ghostly pet or two and choose to Play with them.
String.Dest: หาสัตว์เลี้ยงที่เป็นผีอย่างน้อยหนึ่งหรือสองตัวแล้วเลือก 'เล่น'

String.Dest: สัมผัสถึงความรักกับสัตว์เลี้ยง {1.Number} ตัวที่ไม่ซ้ำกัน

String.Source: Sims should feel free to ascend and descend appropriately lit stairways without needing to cling dearly to a rail. That's what the Hands Free Railing is for! By focusing on subtle aesthetics, Sims will keep their eyes - not their hands - on this staircase accessory.
String.Dest: คือซิมส์ก็ควรจะขึ้นลงบันไดโดยไม่ต้องคอยจับราวอยู่ตลอดเวลาได้แล้ว นั่นคือสิ่งที่ทำให้ 'ราวบันไดแบบไม่ต้องจับ' ถือกำเนิดขึ้น! ด้วยอุปกรณ์เสริมของบันไดชิ้นนี้ ซิมส์จะใช้สายตาในการสอดส่องผลงานการออกแบบสุดละเมียดละไม - แทนที่จะพะวงอยู่กับมือเหมือนแต่ก่อน

String.Source: This treat does exactly what you think it does. Feed it to a pet and…watch what comes out the other end.

String.Source: As cool as this treat is, your pet might need a really, really warm blanket after eating it.
String.Dest: สัตว์เลี้ยงของคุณอาจต้องใช้ผ้าห่มที่โคตรของโคตรอุ่นมาห่ม เพราะว่าจะรู้สึกเย็นตามขนมชิ้นนี้เมื่อได้กินเข้าไป
ขนมขบเคี้ยวอบเชยรสเผ็ด
ทำขนมขบเคี้ยวอบเชยรสเผ็ด

String.Source: This treat doesn’t feel hot to the touch, but if your pet eats it, they’re in for a spicy surprise.
String.Dest: ขนมชิ้นนี้หากหยิบขึ้นมาถือไว้ก็ไม่ได้รู้สึกร้อนอะไรหรอก แต่พอสัตว์เลี้ยงของคุณกินเข้าไปเท่านั้นแหละ น้องจะรู้สึกเผ็ดร้อนแบบคาดไม่ถึงเลย
ตัวสร้างกลิ่นเหม็น
ทำตัวสร้างกลิ่นเหม็น

String.Source: We really wouldn’t recommend feeding this to any animal. They’ll stink, you’ll stink, the whole world will stink…
String.Dest: ไม่แนะนำให้ป้อนขนมชิ้นนี้ให้กับสัตว์ตัวไหนทั้งนั้น เพราะพอตัวมันเหม็น คุณก็จะเหม็น แล้วคนทั้งโลกก็จะเหม็น...
ทอฟฟี่น้ำคลอง
ทำทอฟฟี่น้ำคลอง

String.Source: Made with unfiltered swamp water, this chewy treat is sure to delight any pet! And then have some…other effects.
String.Dest: รับรองเลยว่าขนมเคี้ยวเพลินชิ้นนี้จะทำให้สัตว์เลี้ยงทุกตัวมีความสุขได้! แต่เพราะทำจากน้ำคลองที่ไม่ได้กรองเลย ก็อาจจะมี... อะไรตามมานิดหน่อย
ขนมกินดีอยู่ดี
ทำขนมกินดีอยู่ดี

String.Source: Treat that boosts your pet's wellness.
String.Dest: ขนมที่ช่วยเพิ่มความกินดีอยู่ดีของสัตว์เลี้ยงของคุณ
อ่าวบรินเดิลตัน

String.Source: Tucked away on the eastern seaboard. Brindleton Bay has acquired a reputation for its citizens’ absolute obsession with all things feline and canine. Enjoy the coastal views, the rich maritime history, and all your new four-legged neighbors!
String.Dest: อ่าวบรินเดิลตันแห่งนี้ซ่อนตัวอยู่บนชายทะเลทิศตะวันออก มีชื่อเสียงจากการที่ชาวเมืองหลงใหลในน้องหมาน้องแมวแบบจริงจัง มาสัมผัสทิวทัศน์ใกล้ชายฝั่ง ประวัติศาสตร์การเดินเรือมากมาย และเพื่อนบ้านสี่ขาหน้าใหม่ของคุณกันดีกว่า!
{0.SimFirstName} just became Acquaintances with {1.SimFirstName}.

String.Source: Pets often feels strongly about someone in strong ways, but this pet doesn't seem to feel much of anything.
String.Dest: Pets often feels strongly about someone in strong ways, but this pet doesn't seem to feel much of anything.
Acquaintance
{0.SimFirstName} just became Good Friends with {1.SimFirstName}.

String.Source: Companions are Pets and Pets are Companions, the one that will be there at all times.
String.Dest: Companions are Pets and Pets are Companions, the one that will be there at all times.
Companion
{0.SimFirstName} just became Despised with {1.SimFirstName}.

String.Source: Relationships with Pets are not always positive, this one has gone quite bad.
String.Dest: ความสัมพันธ์กับสัตว์เลี้ยงไม่จำเป็นต้องเป็นเชิงบวกเสมอไป เพราะอันนี้ก็ดูท่าจะกู้ไม่กลับแล้วล่ะ
เกลียดชังกัน
{0.SimFirstName} just became Disliked by {1.SimFirstName}.

String.Source: Things got off on the wrong paw for this relationship. Maybe a treat will help it going in a positive direction.
String.Dest: Things got off on the wrong paw for this relationship. Maybe a treat will help it going in a positive direction.
Disliked
{0.SimFirstName} just became Friends with {1.SimFirstName}.

String.Source: Pets are a friend through and through as long as they get some love in return.
String.Dest: สัตว์เลี้ยงจะเป็นเพื่อนคุณเสมอตราบใดที่พวกมันยังได้รับความรักเป็นการตอบแทน
เพื่อน
{0.SimFirstName} just became Indifferent with {1.SimFirstName}.

String.Source: There's no strong feelings one way or the other.
String.Dest: ไม่มีความรู้สึกชัดเจนไปในทางใดทางนึง
กลางๆ
สัตว์เลี้ยง
เจ้าของ
สัตว์เลี้ยง
เจ้าของ

String.Source: With many tender moments and sentimental memories long forgotten and regrets and heartfelt losses still in mind, {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} are no longer Companions. Stay strong.
String.Dest: With many tender moments and sentimental memories long forgotten and regrets and heartfelt losses still in mind, {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} are no longer Companions. Stay strong.

String.Source: This is a solid relationship built on trust and great memories.
String.Dest: This is a solid relationship built on trust and great memories.
Good Friend
รางวัลซิมสตาแกรม

String.Source: A treat for the Simstagram star.
String.Dest: ขนมสำหรับดาราซิมสตาแกรม
พรายกระซิบสัตว์โลก

String.Source: It is easier to Train and Discipline animals as well as gain relationship with them faster.
String.Dest: สามารถฝึกฝนและตักเตือนสัตว์ทุกชนิดรวมถึงพัฒนาความสัมพันธ์ที่มีต่อพวกเขาได้เร็วขึ้น

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has started to gain some attention! As an up-and-coming Simstagram star, Think Pawsitively Pet Products has sent a small token to thank {M0.him}{F0.her} for {M0.him}{F0.her} outstanding pictures. Check your household inventory, and keep up the good work!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} เริ่มได้รับความสนใจบ้างแล้ว! ในฐานะที่เป็นดาราซิมสตาแกรมที่มีแววเด่น Think Pawsitively Pet Products จึงได้ส่งของรางวัลเล็กๆ น้อยๆ เพื่อเป็นการขอบคุณน้องสำหรับภาพถ่ายที่ดูโดดเด่นเหล่านั้น เปิดช่องเก็บของครัวเรือนของคุณดูได้เลย แล้วก็รักษาความดีงามแบบนี้ต่อไปนะ!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has built up quite a following on Simstagram! Think Pawsitively Pet Products has sent {M0.him}{F0.her} a present in the hopes that {M0.he}{F0.she} might sponsor them some day. Check your household inventory!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} เริ่มมีกลุ่มผู้ติดตามก่อตัวขึ้นในซิมสตาแกรมแล้ว! Think Pawsitively Pet Products จึงได้ส่งของขวัญมาให้ด้วยความหวังที่ว่าสักวันนึงน้องจะหันมาโฆษณาสินค้าให้บ้าง เปิดดูช่องเก็บของครัวเรือนเลยสิ!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} is a social media star! As a valuable Simstagram ambassador, Think Pawsitively Pet Products has a special reward package for {M0.him}{F0.her} that the humans of the house are sure to find useful! Check your household inventory!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} คือดาราแห่งโลกสื่อโซเชียล! ในฐานะที่เป็นตัวแทนของซิมสตาแกรมผู้ทรงเกียรติ Think Pawsitively Pet Products จึงได้ส่งชุดรางวัลสุดพิเศษมาให้น้องที่รับรองว่ามนุษย์ร่วมชายคาต้องนำไปใช้ประโยชน์ได้แน่! เปิดดูช่องเก็บของครัวเรือนเลยสิ!

String.Source: You cannot do this while a Sim is leaving your household!
String.Dest: คุณไม่สามารถทำสิ่งนี้ได้ขณะที่ซิมกำลังจะออกจากครัวเรือนของคุณ!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} had a terrible result of {2.Number} faults with a time of {3.Timespan}. Simply atrocious! {0.SimFirstName}'s result would be a disqualification in an actual competition!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} วิ่งได้แย่พอสมควร ผิดกติกาไป {2.Number} ครั้ง ใช้เวลาทั้งสิ้น {3.Timespan} เลวร้ายใช่มั้ยล่ะ! หาก {0.SimFirstName} ทำสถิติได้เท่านี้ในการแข่งขันจริงจะถือว่าไม่ผ่านเกณฑ์!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has achieved a PERFECT RUN on this course in {3.Timespan}. Wow! {1.SimFirstName} must be a first-class pet training master.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} วิ่งได้ดีเยี่ยมในสนามนี้ ทำเวลาไปเพียง {3.Timespan} เท่านั้น ว้าว! {1.SimFirstName} ต้องเป็นนักฝึกฝนสัตว์เลี้ยงมือหนึ่งแน่ๆ เลย

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} finished the course in {3.Timespan} with {2.Number} faults. That's an awful result! Make sure {1.SimFirstName} trains {0.SimFirstName} more and keeps them in a happy mood before starting to run a course!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} ใช้เวลาวิ่งครบรอบสนามไป {3.Timespan} ทำผิดกติกาไป {2.Number} ครั้ง เป็นผลที่ดูไม่ได้เลย! พยายามให้ {1.SimFirstName} ฝึกฝน {0.SimFirstName} ให้มากขึ้น แล้วทำให้สัตว์เลี้ยงอยู่ในอารมณ์ดีก่อนเริ่มวิ่งในสนาม!

String.Source: Not bad, but not perfect! {0.SimFirstName} had a time of {3.Timespan} and {2.Number} faults during their run. Make sure {1.SimFirstName} gives them proper training and discipline before running the course again.
String.Dest: ไม่แย่ แต่ก็ไม่ได้ดี! สถิติของ {0.SimFirstName} อยู่ที่ {3.Timespan} โดยทำผิดกติกาไป {2.Number} ครั้งตลอดการวิ่ง พยายามให้ {1.SimFirstName} ฝึกฝนสัตว์เลี้ยงให้เหมาะสมและตักเตือนเรื่องกติกาก่อนมาวิ่งครั้งต่อไป

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName}'s course run was canceled! Click on an obstacle and select Run Obstacle Course to try again (make sure you have at least 4 obstacles that they can get to)!
String.Dest: การวิ่งในสนามของ {0.SimFirstName} ถูกยกเลิกแล้ว! คลิกที่สิ่งกีดขวางแล้วเลือก 'วิ่งในสนามสิ่งกีดขวาง' เพื่อลองใหม่อีกครั้ง (ดูให้แน่ใจว่าคุณมีสิ่งกีดขวางอย่างน้อย 4 อันให้น้องๆ ได้วิ่งแล้ว)!
สนามสิ่งกีดขวางสัตว์เลี้ยง

String.Source: Run the pet obstacle course as quickly and accurately as possible! A basic course consists of hoops, ramps, weaving flags, platforms, and tunnels. If your pet is new, they might get confused throughout the run. Keep practicing with them to see them get better!
String.Dest: วิ่งในสนามสิ่งกีดขวางสัตว์เลี้ยงให้ได้เร็วที่สุด แม่นยำที่สุด! สนามขั้นพื้ฐานจะประกอบไปด้วยห่วง ทางลาด เสาซิกแซก แท่นยืน และอุโมงค์ หากสัตว์เลี้ยงของคุณยังไม่คุ้นเคย น้องอาจจะรู้สึกงงระหว่างที่วิ่งอยู่ได้ ฉะนั้นให้ฝึกกับน้องบ่อยๆ เพื่อให้ผลออกมาดีขึ้น!
ตรวจร่างกาย

String.Source: Just here for a checkup? No problem! A Vet will be with you shortly to look over your pet.
String.Dest: มาที่นี่แค่ตรวจร่างกายงั้นเหรอ? ได้สิ ไม่มีปัญหา! สัตวแพทย์จะมาตรวจสัตว์เลี้ยงให้คุณในไม่ช้า
กำลังทำหมันสัตว์เลี้ยง

String.Source: Is it time to get your pet neutered? A Vet will be with you shortly to go through with the procedure.
String.Dest: ได้เวลาทำหมันให้สัตว์เลี้ยงของคุณแล้วใช่มั้ย? งั้นสัตวแพทย์จะมาเริ่มกระบวนการให้คุณในไม่ช้า
กำลังตรวจโรคสัตว์เลี้ยง

String.Source: It sounds like your poor pet is sick! The Vet will be with you shortly to get them examined and treated.
String.Dest: ดูเหมือนว่าสัตว์เลี้ยงของคุณจะป่วยนะ! สัตวแพทย์จะมาตรวจและรักษาโรคสัตว์เลี้ยงให้คุณในไม่ช้า
กำลังตัดรังไข่สัตว์เลี้ยง

String.Source: Is it time to get your pet spayed? A Vet will be with you shortly to go through with the procedure.
String.Dest: ได้เวลาตัดรังไข่ให้สัตว์เลี้ยงของคุณแล้วใช่มั้ย? งั้นสัตวแพทย์จะมาเริ่มกระบวนการให้คุณในไม่ช้า
ฉันต้องการให้สัตว์เลี้ยงถูกตัดรังไข่
กำลังฝังอัณฑะสัตว์เลี้ยง

String.Source: You thought unneutering your pet was impossible? Think again! A Vet will be with you shortly to go through with the procedure.
String.Dest: คุณคงคิดว่าการฝังอัณฑะกลับมาเป็นไปไม่ได้สินะ? เปลี่ยนความคิดเสีย! สัตวแพทย์จะมาเริ่มกระบวนการให้คุณในไม่ช้า
กำลังฝังรังไข่สัตว์เลี้ยง

String.Source: You thought unspaying your pet was impossible? Think again! A Vet will be with you shortly to go through with the procedure.
String.Dest: คุณคงคิดว่าการฝังรังไข่กลับมาเป็นไปไม่ได้สินะ? เปลี่ยนความคิดเสีย! สัตวแพทย์จะมาเริ่มกระบวนการให้คุณในไม่ช้า
ฉันต้องการให้สัตว์เลี้ยงกลับมามีรังไข่

String.Source: “My cat, {0.SimFirstName}, has been doing well, but it's time for {M0.his}{F0.her} checkup."
String.Dest: “น้องเหมียวของฉัน {0.SimFirstName} ไม่ได้เป็นอะไรหรอก แค่คิดว่าคงได้เวลาพาน้องมาตรวจร่างกายแล้ว"

String.Source: “My dog, {0.SimFirstName}, has been doing well, but it's time for {M0.his}{F0.her} checkup."
String.Dest: “น้องหมาของฉัน {0.SimFirstName} ไม่ได้เป็นอะไรหรอก แค่คิดว่าคงได้เวลาพาน้องมาตรวจร่างกายแล้ว"

String.Source: "Just a standard checkup for {0.SimFirstName} today please, doc!"
String.Dest: "แค่มาตรวจร่างกายประจำวันให้ {0.SimFirstName} น่ะ คุณหมอ!"
ผลการตรวจโรค
ความเครียดผู้ป่วย
ผลการวินิจฉัย: ไม่ทราบ
ไม่ทราบ

String.Source: “Something is wrong with my little {F0.girl}{M0.boy}, {0.SimFirstName}. Won’t you please help {F0.her}{M0.him}?”
String.Dest: “มีบางอย่างผิดปกติในตัวลูก{F0.สาว}{M0.ชาย} {0.SimFirstName} ของฉัน ได้โปรดช่วยน้องทีได้ไหม?”

String.Source: “I’m not sure what is going on with {0.SimFirstName}, but it’s not good! Do you think you could help?”
String.Dest: “ฉันไม่แน่ใจว่า {0.SimFirstName} รู้สึกยังไงบ้างตอนนี้ แต่มันคงไม่ดีแน่ล่ะ! คุณพอจะช่วยได้ไหม?”

String.Source: “{0.SimFirstName} means the world to me, and {F0.she}{M0.he} has been feeling awful lately. Whatever you can do to help will be greatly appreciated!”
String.Dest: “{0.SimFirstName} คือโลกทั้งใบของฉัน หลังๆ มานี้เหมือนว่าน้องจะรู้สึกแย่มากเลย ถ้าคุณช่วยได้จะเป็นพระคุณอย่างยิ่ง!”

String.Source: “{0.SimFirstName} just hasn’t been acting like {F0.herself}{M0.himself}. I think something may be wrong, can you please take a look?”
String.Dest: “ช่วงนี้ {0.SimFirstName} ดูไม่เป็นตัวของตัวเองเลย ฉันคิดว่าน่าจะมีอะไรผิดปกติ คุณตรวจดูให้หน่อยได้มั้ย?”

String.Source: “I’ve never seen {0.SimFirstName} acting like this before. I hoped it would go away, but it’s only gotten worse! Please see what you can do!”
String.Dest: “ฉันไม่เคยเห็น {0.SimFirstName} เป็นแบบนี้มาก่อน ฉันหวังว่าสักวันเดี๋ยวมันก็หายไป แต่ว่านับวันมันกลับแย่ลง! รบกวนดูให้ทีนะว่าคุณช่วยจะอะไรได้บ้าง!”

String.Source: "{0.SimFirstName} has been looking a bit sickly lately, can you examine {F0.her}{M0.him}?"
String.Dest: "หลังๆ มานี้ {0.SimFirstName} ดูเหมือนจะป่วยนิดๆ หน่อยๆ รบกวนช่วยตรวจโรคให้น้องหน่อยได้มั้ย?"
รักษาผู้ป่วย
การทำผิดกติกา

String.Source: When a pet does something wrong Pet Agility Worldwide (PAW) considers it a fault. This can be anything from a pet stalling, to them going through an obstacle incorrectly, to them not even running through an obstacle at all. Keep your pets well trained to avoid this!
String.Dest: เมื่อสัตว์เลี้ยงของคุณทำอะไรผิดแปลกไป คณะกรรมการสัตว์คล่องแคล่วนานาชาติ (คสน) จะตัดสินว่าผิดกติกาทันที หมายรวมตั้งแต่การถ่วงเวลาสัตว์เลี้ยง ไปจนถึงการวิ่งผ่านสิ่งกีดขวางแบบไม่ถูกต้อง หรือไม่ยอมวิ่งข้ามสิ่งกีดขวางแม้แต่อันเดียว ฉะนั้นหมั่นซ้อมสัตว์เลี้ยงของคุณให้ดีเพื่อไม่ให้เกิดเรื่องเช่นนี้!
รับการรักษา
สัตว์เลี้ยงเข้ารับการตรวจโรค
กระบวนการกำลังดำเนินไป
รอสัตวแพทย์
เลือกดูสินค้าในตู้

String.Source: Take a look at what the Vending Machine has to offer by clicking on it and selecting "Purchase Pet Items."
String.Dest: ลองดูว่าในตู้ขายสินค้านั้นมีอะไรให้ซื้อบ้างโดยคลิกแล้วเลือก "ซื้อไอเท็มสัตว์เลี้ยง"
ซื้อเครื่องให้อาหารสัตว์เลี้ยงอัตโนมัติ

String.Source: Purchase an Automatic Pet Feeder in Build Mode.
String.Dest: ซื้อเครื่องให้อาหารสัตว์เลี้ยงอัตโนมัติจากโหมดสร้าง
ซื้อคอนโดแมว

String.Source: Purchase a Cat Condo in Build Mode.
String.Dest: ซื้อคอนโดแมวจากโหมดสร้าง
ซื้อไม้ล่อแมว

String.Source: Purchase a Cat Wand in Build Mode.
String.Dest: ซื้อไม้ล่อแมวจากโหมดสร้าง
ซื้อกระบะทราย

String.Source: Purchase a Litter Box in Build Mode.
String.Dest: ซื้อกระบะทรายจากโหมดสร้าง
ซื้อกระบะทรายอัจฉริยะ

String.Source: Purchase a High-Tech Litter Box in Build Mode.
String.Dest: ซื้อกระบะทรายอัจฉริยะจากโหมดสร้าง
ซื้อที่นอนสัตว์เลี้ยง

String.Source: Purchase a Pet Bed in Build Mode.
String.Dest: ซื้อที่นอนสัตว์เลี้ยงจากโหมดสร้าง
ซื้อกล่องของเล่นสัตว์เลี้ยง

String.Source: Purchase a Pet Toy Box in Build Mode.
String.Dest: ซื้อกล่องของเล่นสัตว์เลี้ยงจากโหมดสร้าง
ซื้อเครื่องผ่าตัด

String.Source: Purchase a Surgery Station in Build Mode.
String.Dest: ซื้อเครื่องผ่าตัดจากโหมดสร้าง
ซื้อลูกบอลสัตว์เลี้ยง

String.Source: Purchase a Pet Ball in Build Mode.
String.Dest: ซื้อลูกบอลสัตว์เลี้ยงในโหมดสร้าง
ซื้อของเล่นมีเสียง

String.Source: Purchase a Squeaky Toy in Build Mode, by selecting Buy Toys on a Pet Toy Box, or by selecting Buy Pet Supplies at a market stall in Brindleton Bay.
String.Dest: ซื้อของเล่นมีเสียงในโหมวดสร้าง โดยการเลือกคำสั่ง 'ซื้อของเล่น' ที่กล่องของเล่นสัตว์เลี้ยง หรือจากคำสั่ง 'ซื้ออุปกรณ์สัตว์เลี้ยง' ที่ร้านแผงลอยในอ่าวบรินเดิลตัน
ใช้ตัวชี้เลเซอร์ของคุณกับ {2.SimFirstName}

String.Source: Click on {2.SimFirstName} and select Play with Laser Pointer from the social interactions.
String.Dest: คลิกที่ {2.SimFirstName} แล้วเลือกคำสั่งสังคม 'เล่นโดยใช้ตัวชี้เลเซอร์'
ใช้ไม้ล่อแมวของคุณกับ {2.SimFirstName}

String.Source: Click on {2.SimFirstName} with a Cat Wand in your inventory.
String.Dest: คลิกที่ {2.SimFirstName} โดยมีไม้ล่อแมวอยู่ในช่องเก็บของของคุณ
รับเลี้ยงแมวหนึ่งตัว

String.Source: Use Computer to Adopt a Cat from household category.
String.Dest: ใช้คอมพิวเตอร์เพื่อ 'รับเลี้ยงแมว' จากหมวดครัวเรือน
รับเลี้ยงสุนัขหนึ่งตัว

String.Source: Use Computer to Adopt a Dog from household category.
String.Dest: ใช้คอมพิวเตอร์เพื่อ 'รับเลี้ยงสุนัข' จากหมวดครัวเรือน
พาสุนัขไปเดินเล่น

String.Source: Select a dog and click any of the Go On Walk interactions.
String.Dest: คลิกที่สุนัขแล้วเลือกคำสั่งใดก็ได้ที่เป็น 'ออกไปเดินเล่น'
เก็บกวาดกองขน!

String.Source: Select a pile of hair and clean it up.
String.Dest: คลิกที่กองขนจากนั้นเก็บกวาด
พบแมวหนึ่งตัว

String.Source: Click on a cat you don't know and introduce yourself. There are never enough cats to befriend!
String.Dest: คลิกที่แมวที่คุณไม่รู้จักแล้วแนะนำตัวคุณกับน้อง บอกเลยว่าจะมีแมวกี่ตัวก็ไม่พอให้ผูกมิตร!
พบสุนัขหนึ่งตัว

String.Source: Click on a dog you don't know and introduce yourself. There are never enough dogs to befriend!
String.Dest: คลิกที่สุนัขที่คุณไม่รู้จักแล้วแนะนำตัวคุณกับน้อง บอกเลยว่าจะมีสุนัขกี่ตัวก็ไม่พอให้ผูกมิตร!
ลูบไล้แมวหนึ่งครั้ง

String.Source: Find a cat and choose Pet from the Friendly category.
String.Dest: หาแมวสักตัวแล้วเลือกคำสั่ง 'ลูบไล้' จากหมวดเป็นมิตร
เล่นกับแมวหนึ่งตัว

String.Source: Find a cat and choose to Play with Laser Pointer or purchase The Cat Dazzler from Build Mode to play with your cat.
String.Dest: หาแมวหนึ่งตัวแล้วเลือก 'เล่นโดยใช้ตัวชี้เลเซอร์' หรือซื้อ The Cat Dazzler จากโหมดสร้างเพื่อนำมาเล่นกับสัตว์เลี้ยงของคุณ
ลูบไล้สุนัขหนึ่งครั้ง

String.Source: Find a dog and choose Pet from the Friendly category.
String.Dest: หาสุนัขสักตัวแล้วเลือกคำสั่ง 'ลูบไล้' จากหมวดเป็นมิตร
เล่นกับสุนัขหนึ่งตัว

String.Source: Find a dog and select Play from the Friendly category.
String.Dest: หาสุนัขสักตัวแล้วเลือกคำสั่ง 'เล่น' จากหมวดเป็นมิตร
ซื้อเสาข่วนเล็บ

String.Source: Purchase a Scratching Post from Build Mode. Look for it in the Living Room Sort!
String.Dest: ซื้อเสาข่วนเล็บจากโหมดสร้าง หาซื้อสิ่งนี้ได้จากกลุ่ม 'ห้องนั่งเล่น'!
เล่นคาบสิ่งของ

String.Source: Click on a dog while the Pet Ball is in your Sims inventory to Train Fetch.
String.Dest: คลิกที่สุนัขขณะที่มีลูกบอลสัตว์เลี้ยงอยู่ในช่องเก็บของเพื่อใช้คำสั่ง 'ฝึกฝนการคาบสิ่งของ'
รักษาสัตว์เลี้ยง

String.Source: Treat a sick pet at an Exam Table or Surgery Station.
String.Dest: รักษาสัตว์เลี้ยงที่ป่วยบนโต๊ะตรวจโรคหรือเครื่องผ่าตัด
ซื้อชามอาหารสัตว์เลี้ยง

String.Source: Purchase a Pet Food Bowl for your pet.
String.Dest: ซื้อชามอาหารสัตว์เลี้ยงให้กับสัตว์เลี้ยงของคุณ
ทำอาหารสัตว์เลี้ยงชั้นเลิศ

String.Source: Use the fridge or stove to cook gourmet pet food!
String.Dest: ใช้ตู้เย็นหรือเตาอาหารทำอาหารสัตว์เลี้ยงชั้นเลิศ!
ทำอาหารสัตว์เลี้ยง

String.Source: Use the fridge or stove to cook pet food!
String.Dest: ใช้ตู้เย็นหรือเตาอาหารทำอาหารสัตว์เลี้ยง!
ศูนย์เลี้ยงดูเจ้าสี่ขา
สัตวแพทย์
ผู้ป่วย
เจ้าของสัตว์เลี้ยง
เจ้าของสัตว์เลี้ยง
หาเจ้าของใหม่!
เจ้าหน้าที่รับเลี้ยง
สัตว์เลี้ยงเร่ร่อน

String.Source: All a dog and {M1.his}{F1.her} human need is a simple visit to the Town Square.
String.Dest: สิ่งที่สุนัขตัวนึงกับเจ้านายของน้องต้องการก็คืออะไรง่ายๆ อย่างการไปจัตุรัสกลางเมืองเท่านั้นเอง

String.Source:
{0.SimFirstName} would like to help every crying child in the world, but {M0.he}{F0.she} has {M0.his}{F0.her} own priorities. {M0.He}{F0.She} pulls {1.SimFirstName} back and keeps walking.
{1.SimFirstName} seems a little miffed at first and takes {M1.his}{F1.her} time peeing on a fire hydrant. They finish their perfectly square walk, in perfect time. {0.SimFirstName} pets {1.SimFirstName} between the ears, and {1.SimFirstName} returns it with a sloppy kiss. It really was a good walk.
String.Dest:
{0.SimFirstName} อยากจะช่วยเด็กผู้ร่ำไห้ทุกคนบนโลกนี้เหมือนกัน แต่ว่า{M0.เขา}{F0.เธอ}เองก็มีภาระหน้าที่ของตน {M0.เขา}{F0.เธอ}จึงดึง {1.SimFirstName} กลับมาแล้วออกเดินต่อไป
ตอนแรก {1.SimFirstName} ดูเหมือนจะไม่ค่อยพอใจเท่าไร จากนั้นจึงใช้เวลาไปกับการฉี่ใส่หัวดับเพลิง หลังจากที่พวกเขาทั้งคู่เดินเล่นในจัตุรัสเมืองเสร็จแล้ว {0.SimFirstName} ก็ลูบไล้ {1.SimFirstName} บริเวณศีรษะ {1.SimFirstName} จึงตอบโต้ด้วยการจูบแบบเลียใบหน้า{M0.เขา}{F0.เธอ} มันช่างเป็นการเดินเล่นที่ดีจริงๆ เลยนะ

String.Source:
{0.SimFirstName} would have to be a monster to ignore a crying child. {1.SimFirstName} leads them in a diagonal jaywalk across the street.
The toddler is incoherent. There isn't much {0.SimFirstName} can do, so {M0.he}{F0.she} tries to entertain the tot by having {1.SimFirstName} perform a trick. The toddler's distraught parent comes by soon after, at which point the tears are gone and the toddler is cheering in delight at The Fantastic {1.SimFirstName}'s Death-Defying Sit.
String.Dest:
{0.SimFirstName} อาจกลายเป็นสัตว์ร้ายได้ หากเมินเฉยต่อเด็กผู้ร่ำไห้ {1.SimFirstName} จึงกระเตงกันข้ามถนนมาแบบไม่ระวังสักนิด
เด็กเล็กผู้นั้นคงพัดหลงมาอะนะ ตัว {0.SimFirstName} เองก็ทำอะไรได้ไม่มาก {M0.เขา}{F0.เธอ}จึงพยายามจะทำให้หนูน้อยร่าเริงขึ้นด้วยการสั่งให้ {1.SimFirstName} แสดงทักษะพิเศษ จากนั้นไม่นาน พ่อแม่ของเด็กคนดังกล่าวก็กลับมา ซึ่ง ณ ตอนนี้น้ำตาบนแก้มได้เหือดแห้งไปแล้ว เพราะเจ้าหนูน้อยกำลังรู้สึกยินดีปรีดากับท่านั่งสุดอันตรายของ {1.SimFirstName} อยู่
เดินต่อไป
หยุดคุยด้วย

String.Source:
Everything is going just as expected. {0.SimFirstName} takes the third left on the last turn towards home. Maybe {M0.he}{F0.she} can finally achieve {M0.his}{F0.her} dream: a square walk around the Town Square.
{1.SimName} does not share his vision. Ahead, a toddler is crying on a bench and {1.SimName} tugs {M1.his}{F1.her} leash towards him.
String.Dest:
ทุกอย่างเป็นไปตามที่ได้คาดเอาไว้ {0.SimFirstName} เลี้ยวซ้ายเป็นครั้งที่สามในการเดินรอบสุดท้ายเพื่อมุ่งกลับบ้าน เพราะตอนนี้{M0.เขา}{F0.เธอ}คงบรรลุความฝันสูงสุดของตัวเองที่อยากเดินเป็นสี่เหลี่ยมจัตุรัสรอบจัตุรัสของเมืองแล้ว
แต่สิ่งที่ {1.SimName} เห็นไม่ใช่แบบนั้น ข้างหน้าน้องคือเด็กน้อยที่กำลังนั่งร้องไห้อยู่บนม้านั่ง {1.SimName} จึงฉุดดึงสายล่ามไปหาเจ้าหนูน้อยคนนั้น

String.Source:
Just in time, {0.SimFirstName} contains {1.SimFirstName}'s animal instinct to launch into mud. With {1.SimFirstName} still suspended by the end of the leash, {0.SimFirstName} takes a second to look over and see what has the dog so intrigued.
Something is there, hidden under the mud. {0.SimFirstName} slacks the leash, allowing {1.SimFirstName} to pick it up. {1.SimFirstName}'s head is held high as {M1.he}{F1.she} proudly walks {M1.his}{F1.her} treasure home.
String.Dest:
Just in time, {0.SimFirstName} contains {1.SimFirstName}'s animal instinct to launch into mud. With {1.SimFirstName} still suspended by the end of the leash, {0.SimFirstName} takes a second to look over and see what has the dog so intrigued.
Something is there, hidden under the mud. {0.SimFirstName} slacks the leash, allowing {1.SimFirstName} to pick it up. {1.SimFirstName}'s head is held high as {M1.he}{F1.she} proudly walks {M1.his}{F1.her} treasure home.

String.Source:
It was done in an instant. Forced forward by the sheer will for adventure, both dog and human catapult into mud. {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} finish their walk home, absolutely filthy.
Even so, it's hard to stay mad. {1.SimFirstName} might smell like garbage, but {M1.his}{F1.her} tail is wagging. {0.SimFirstName}'s happy {M1.he}{F1.she} had a good time.
String.Dest:
It was done in an instant. Forced forward by the sheer will for adventure, both dog and human catapult into mud. {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} finish their walk home, absolutely filthy.
Even so, it's hard to stay mad. {1.SimFirstName} might smell like garbage, but {M1.his}{F1.her} tail is wagging. {0.SimFirstName}'s happy {M1.he}{F1.she} had a good time.
ดึงกลับมา
ปิดตาและประตูความหวังของ{M0.เขา}{F0.เธอ}เสีย

String.Source:
{0.SimFirstName} enjoys the routine of {M0.his}{F0.her} neighborhood. {M0.he}{F0.she} closes {M0.his}{F0.her} eyes and takes in a deep breath. Expecting crisp outdoor air, {M0.he}{F0.she} chokes, coughing over a sudden overwhelming smell.
{1.SimFirstName} has lead them to a dirt pile the size of a small schnauzer. {1.SimFirstName} lurches into it, head first. {0.SimFirstName} has a split second to react
String.Dest:
{0.SimFirstName} enjoys the routine of {M0.his}{F0.her} neighborhood. {M0.he}{F0.she} closes {M0.his}{F0.her} eyes and takes in a deep breath. Expecting crisp outdoor air, {M0.he}{F0.she} chokes, coughing over a sudden overwhelming smell.
{1.SimFirstName} has lead them to a dirt pile the size of a small schnauzer. {1.SimFirstName} lurches into it, head first. {0.SimFirstName} has a split second to react

String.Source:
{1.SimFirstName} circles both of them nervously as they get back on their feet. {0.SimFirstName} gets up first and gives the stranger a hand.
They both laugh it off, and what started as a walk with two ends with three. {0.SimFirstName} has made a new acquaintance.
String.Dest:
{1.SimFirstName} circles both of them nervously as they get back on their feet. {0.SimFirstName} gets up first and gives the stranger a hand.
They both laugh it off, and what started as a walk with two ends with three. {0.SimFirstName} has made a new acquaintance.

String.Source:
{0.SimFirstName} is dazed from the fall. {M0.His}{F0.Her} hands wave in the air as {M0.he}{F0.she} struggles to find {M0.his}{F0.her} balance.
After a while, {0.SimFirstName} gets to {M0.his}{F0.her} feet, but the other person is nowhere in sight. They must've left {M0.him}{F0.her} lying on the ground. "What kind of person does that?" thinks {0.SimFirstName}. After {M0.he}{F0.she} returns home, {M0.he}{F0.she} gives {M0.his}{F0.her} canine companion an extra treat.
String.Dest:
{0.SimFirstName} is dazed from the fall. {M0.His}{F0.Her} hands wave in the air as {M0.he}{F0.she} struggles to find {M0.his}{F0.her} balance.
After a while, {0.SimFirstName} gets to {M0.his}{F0.her} feet, but the other person is nowhere in sight. They must've left {M0.him}{F0.her} lying on the ground. "What kind of person does that?" thinks {0.SimFirstName}. After {M0.he}{F0.she} returns home, {M0.he}{F0.she} gives {M0.his}{F0.her} canine companion an extra treat.
จัตุรัสกลางเมือง
Help Up {M0.His}{F0.Her} Fellow Human
Just Try to Stand

String.Source:
Just {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName}, out for a walk. {0.SimFirstName} appreciates time with {M0.his}{F0.her} pet, as it feels like sometimes {M0.he}{F0.she} obeys a compulsive need to socialize with other people. It's nice to have a moment alone.
As {0.SimFirstName} reflects on this, {M0.he}{F0.she} walks straight into someone turning the same corner and falls down. {1.SimFirstName} looks over {M0.him}{F0.her} with worry, wondering what {0.SimFirstName} will do next.
String.Dest:
Just {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName}, out for a walk. {0.SimFirstName} appreciates time with {M0.his}{F0.her} pet, as it feels like sometimes {M0.he}{F0.she} obeys a compulsive need to socialize with other people. It's nice to have a moment alone.
As {0.SimFirstName} reflects on this, {M0.he}{F0.she} walks straight into someone turning the same corner and falls down. {1.SimFirstName} looks over {M0.him}{F0.her} with worry, wondering what {0.SimFirstName} will do next.

String.Source:
The two enter the Brindleton Light Information Center and Gift Shop, where an elderly white-haired man is selling postcards.
He sees them and brightens up. "The top of the lighthouse is always open for the best views of the bay, but I'm about to go on break. Next time, I'll take you through and teach you some interesting history!"
With that, he shoos them out where {0.SimFirstName} looks up at the lighthouse once more before heading home.
String.Dest:
The two enter the Brindleton Light Information Center and Gift Shop, where an elderly white-haired man is selling postcards.
He sees them and brightens up. "The top of the lighthouse is always open for the best views of the bay, but I'm about to go on break. Next time, I'll take you through and teach you some interesting history!"
With that, he shoos them out where {0.SimFirstName} looks up at the lighthouse once more before heading home.

String.Source:
As tempting as it would be to explore the lighthouse on their own, {0.SimFirstName} encourages {1.SimFirstName} to stay on this side of the door.
The two browse the shop for a bit and learn some interesting facts - that the lighthouse has only been dark for 24 hours since it first opened and that the older stairways inside the lighthouse are closed but still considered perfectly safe to climb.
As {0.SimFirstName} looks over a poster with the historical timeline of the lighthouse, {1.SimFirstName} scurries back to {M0.him}{F0.her} in a rush, eyeing the door marked Private nervously. {0.SimFirstName} looks up and sees...what? A white flash going by? A...ghost? Impossible!
{0.SimFirstName} promises {1.SimFirstName} they'll return next time to follow up.
String.Dest:
As tempting as it would be to explore the lighthouse on their own, {0.SimFirstName} encourages {1.SimFirstName} to stay on this side of the door.
The two browse the shop for a bit and learn some interesting facts - that the lighthouse has only been dark for 24 hours since it first opened and that the older stairways inside the lighthouse are closed but still considered perfectly safe to climb.
As {0.SimFirstName} looks over a poster with the historical timeline of the lighthouse, {1.SimFirstName} scurries back to {M0.him}{F0.her} in a rush, eyeing the door marked Private nervously. {0.SimFirstName} looks up and sees...what? A white flash going by? A...ghost? Impossible!
{0.SimFirstName} promises {1.SimFirstName} they'll return next time to follow up.

String.Source:
{0.SimFirstName} tries the door handle, which turns easily, and the two tumble through. After their eyes adjust to the darkness, they see a small storage area with boxes stacked on boxes.
At the end of the room is a rickety-looking roped-off stairway. {0.SimFirstName} notices a white tablecloth in a nearby storage box and slips it on. "Look, I'm a ghost!" {M0.he}{F0.she} shouts, as {1.SimFirstName} starts barking at something behind {0.SimFirstName}.
{0.SimFirstName} can't see much with the tablecloth on {M0.his}{F0.her} head. {M0.He}{F0.She} pulls it off to see a small...apparition dart up the stairs. {1.SimFirstName} howls but the chase is already lost. "Probably just a raccoon," {0.SimFirstName} says, and pats {1.SimFirstName} on the head, promising to return to the lighthouse.

มุ่งหน้ากลับบ้าน
Sneak Through the Private Door

String.Source: Browse the Goods in the Gift Shop
String.Dest: เลือกดูสินค้าในร้านขายของที่ระลึก

String.Source:
They've barely rounded the block before {1.SimFirstName} takes off for the lighthouse. They step into the gift shop but the old man isn't there.
The two wait for a moment, but the stillness of the shop starts to give {0.SimFirstName} goosebumps. {1.SimFirstName} paws at a door off the back marked Private. Should the pair explore on their own?
String.Dest:
They've barely rounded the block before {1.SimFirstName} takes off for the lighthouse. They step into the gift shop but the old man isn't there.
The two wait for a moment, but the stillness of the shop starts to give {0.SimFirstName} goosebumps. {1.SimFirstName} paws at a door off the back marked Private. Should the pair explore on their own?

String.Source:
They walk in and the old man says, "ready to learn a little something?" As he begins the tour, {0.SimFirstName} interjects with a question about the supposed ghost that haunts the lighthouse.
"Oh, that old story," the man mutters, as if he can't be bothered. "Some say it's the old pooch who belonged Mr. Friendly - the last person to run the lighthouse. Hanging around, unfinished business or some nonsense."
"Mr. Friendly was let go when he let the lighthouse go dark, causing a shipwreck. That damn dog wouldn't leave, though, and died right in the lighthouse office." As the tour ends, the man sends {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} on their way, though the story of Mr. Friendly's dog makes their hairs all stand a bit straighter.
String.Dest:
They walk in and the old man says, "ready to learn a little something?" As he begins the tour, {0.SimFirstName} interjects with a question about the supposed ghost that haunts the lighthouse.
"Oh, that old story," the man mutters, as if he can't be bothered. "Some say it's the old pooch who belonged Mr. Friendly - the last person to run the lighthouse. Hanging around, unfinished business or some nonsense."
"Mr. Friendly was let go when he let the lighthouse go dark, causing a shipwreck. That damn dog wouldn't leave, though, and died right in the lighthouse office." As the tour ends, the man sends {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} on their way, though the story of Mr. Friendly's dog makes their hairs all stand a bit straighter.

String.Source:
{0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} wait until the man's gone, then swoop into the shop and hurtle through the door they're not supposed to hurtle through. The two head up the rickety steps and find a door simply marked Office.
There's no lock and the door opens creakily. {1.SimFirstName} nudges {0.SimFirstName} toward the far wall, where on a bulletin board are pinned various articles about the Brindleton Wreck and a few pictures of a friendly-looking man and his dog in front of the lighthouse.
He's reading an article intently when {1.SimFirstName} nearly bowls {M0.him}{F0.her} over. That's when {0.SimFirstName} hears someone opening the door. The two hide in the shadows of the room; just in time, as the old man has returned and clatters into the room.
He's moving quickly and sounds angry. He mutters something about a change in the shipping schedule and storms out. {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} wait a good ten minutes before leaving themselves, nervous and suspicious.
String.Dest:
{0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} wait until the man's gone, then swoop into the shop and hurtle through the door they're not supposed to hurtle through. The two head up the rickety steps and find a door simply marked Office.

He's reading an article intently when {1.SimFirstName} nearly bowls {M0.him}{F0.her} over. That's when {0.SimFirstName} hears someone opening the door. The two hide in the shadows of the room; just in time, as the old man has returned and clatters into the room.
He's moving quickly and sounds angry. He mutters something about a change in the shipping schedule and storms out. {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} wait a good ten minutes before leaving themselves, nervous and suspicious.
Wait to Sneak In
Take the Tour

String.Source:
As {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} get to the lighthouse, they notice the old man once again working diligently.
They remember him mentioning that behind-the-scenes tour, but they also remember the staircase and the ghost. Or not - {0.SimFirstName}'s convinced {M0.himself}{F0.herself} there's a sensible explanation for all of this.
Should they take the man up on his offer to show them around the lighthouse or wait for a moment when they can sneak into the lighthouse undisturbed?
String.Dest:
As {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} get to the lighthouse, they notice the old man once again working diligently.
They remember him mentioning that behind-the-scenes tour, but they also remember the staircase and the ghost. Or not - {0.SimFirstName}'s convinced {M0.himself}{F0.herself} there's a sensible explanation for all of this.
Should they take the man up on his offer to show them around the lighthouse or wait for a moment when they can sneak into the lighthouse undisturbed?

String.Source:
"Oh, that old story," the man mutters, as if he can't be bothered. "Some say the pooch belonged to Mr. Friendly, who used run this lighthouse. That it still haunts it today! Unfinished business or some nonsense. But I've never seen nor heard it for as long as I've been here." By his slow movements, {0.SimFirstName} assumes that's quite some time.
"You know what it is," the old man says. "I bet it's just some young rascals getting into our tablecloths we keep in storage and making out like they're a spirit."
The tour ends as abruptly as it began. As they head home, {0.SimFirstName} assures {1.SimFirstName} they'll return and figure out this whole ghost thing one way or another. {0.SimFirstName} looks back and a shiver goes down {M0.his}{F0.her} spine as {M0.he}{F0.she} sees the old man staring right at them from the darkened gift shop.
String.Dest:
"Oh, that old story," the man mutters, as if he can't be bothered. "Some say the pooch belonged to Mr. Friendly, who used run this lighthouse. That it still haunts it today! Unfinished business or some nonsense. But I've never seen nor heard it for as long as I've been here." By his slow movements, {0.SimFirstName} assumes that's quite some time.
"You know what it is," the old man says. "I bet it's just some young rascals getting into our tablecloths we keep in storage and making out like they're a spirit."
The tour ends as abruptly as it began. As they head home, {0.SimFirstName} assures {1.SimFirstName} they'll return and figure out this whole ghost thing one way or another. {0.SimFirstName} looks back and a shiver goes down {M0.his}{F0.her} spine as {M0.he}{F0.she} sees the old man staring right at them from the darkened gift shop.

String.Source:
"It was a sad day, indeed," the old man replies. The man running the lighthouse at the time - one Mr. Friendly - had taken his dog to the vet, forgetting that a cargo ship was docking that night.
The lighthouse light was left off and the ship wrecked. While there were no deaths, a large crab shipment was lost and along with it, the lucrative contract Brindleton Bay had established with the crabbing company.
The man continues, "anyway, Mr. Friendly was sacked but his damn dog wouldn't leave the lighthouse and died soon after right in the office."
The tour ends soon after and {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} vow to return, though the story of the dog who died in the lighthouse haunts them on their way home.
String.Dest:
"It was a sad day, indeed," the old man replies. The man running the lighthouse at the time - one Mr. Friendly - had taken his dog to the vet, forgetting that a cargo ship was docking that night.
The lighthouse light was left off and the ship wrecked. While there were no deaths, a large crab shipment was lost and along with it, the lucrative contract Brindleton Bay had established with the crabbing company.
The man continues, "anyway, Mr. Friendly was sacked but his damn dog wouldn't leave the lighthouse and died soon after right in the office."
The tour ends soon after and {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} vow to return, though the story of the dog who died in the lighthouse haunts them on their way home.
ถามถึงผีตนนั้น

String.Source: Ask About the Lighthouse Going Dark
String.Dest: ถามถึงการที่ประภาคารเริ่มมืดลง

String.Source:
As {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} get to the lighthouse, they notice the old man once again working diligently at the gift shop. He launches into a history of the lighthouse before they've said two words and continues talking as he guides them upstairs to the top of the lighthouse.
It's interesting, but a bit dry. Dates and names and construction materials all start to run together, and {1.SimFirstName} is starting to get restless. {0.SimFirstName} wants to ask about the ghost, but it also feels like a bit of a silly question.
String.Dest:
As {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} get to the lighthouse, they notice the old man once again working diligently at the gift shop. He launches into a history of the lighthouse before they've said two words and continues talking as he guides them upstairs to the top of the lighthouse.
It's interesting, but a bit dry. Dates and names and construction materials all start to run together, and {1.SimFirstName} is starting to get restless. {0.SimFirstName} wants to ask about the ghost, but it also feels like a bit of a silly question.

String.Source:
{0.SimFirstName} spreads the glue on the floor of the lookout behind the old man, who is busy watching for something out at sea. It dries quickly.
{1.SimFirstName} nuzzles the ghostly dog, who drifts through the old man. The sensation surprises him and he yelps and stumbles backwards. Right into the glue! He sticks and falls. {1.SimFirstName} growls at him and takes the man's hair in his mouth as {0.SimFirstName} approaches.
He's about to question the man when {1.SimFirstName} tugs on his hair and a mask pulls off his face, revealing the surly expression of a much younger man with blonde hair.
String.Dest:
{0.SimFirstName} spreads the glue on the floor of the lookout behind the old man, who is busy watching for something out at sea. It dries quickly.
{1.SimFirstName} nuzzles the ghostly dog, who drifts through the old man. The sensation surprises him and he yelps and stumbles backwards. Right into the glue! He sticks and falls. {1.SimFirstName} growls at him and takes the man's hair in his mouth as {0.SimFirstName} approaches.
He's about to question the man when {1.SimFirstName} tugs on his hair and a mask pulls off his face, revealing the surly expression of a much younger man with blonde hair.

String.Source:
{0.SimFirstName} throws the tablecloth on {1.SimFirstName}, who looks kind of sort of like a ghost dog. Still, it's better than nothing.
{1.SimFirstName} charges at the old man, but as {M1.he}{F1.she} starts to bark the cloth falls off, revealing the ordinary corporeal dog that {1.SimFirstName} is. The old man chuckles and turns back to the sea.
His expression changes a few seconds later, though, as the actual ghost dog floats inches from his face. He staggers backward, trips on {1.SimFirstName}, and falls with a thump onto the floor of the lookout.
{1.SimFirstName} takes the man's hair in his mouth as {0.SimFirstName} approaches. As {M0.he's}{F0.she's} about to question the man, {1.SimFirstName} tugs on his hair and a mask pulls off his face, revealing the surly expression of a much younger man with blonde hair.

Wait, what?

String.Source: Dress {1.SimFirstName} as a Ghost with a Tablecloth
String.Dest: Dress {1.SimFirstName} as a Ghost with a Tablecloth

String.Source: Use the Wood Glue to Trap the Old Man
String.Dest: Use the Wood Glue to Trap the Old Man

String.Source:
{0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} arrive at the lighthouse again, hoping to finally catch the alleged ghost.
The Private door is locked, so the two wind their way up to the top of the lighthouse. As they approach the top, {1.SimFirstName} calms {0.SimFirstName}, pointing out at the old man leaning on the railing.
The two hide behind a crate full of wood glue and tablecloths and listen to the man talking to himself. {0.SimFirstName} hears him cry something about his revenge being almost complete. Uh oh. That doesn't sound good.
Suddenly, something rises out of the crate in front of them, and it's all {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} can do to not shout. It's the ghost! The ethereal hound seems friendly though, and gestures at the crate, then at the old man. {0.SimFirstName} nods, knowing what to do.
String.Dest:
{0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} arrive at the lighthouse again, hoping to finally catch the alleged ghost.
The Private door is locked, so the two wind their way up to the top of the lighthouse. As they approach the top, {1.SimFirstName} calms {0.SimFirstName}, pointing out at the old man leaning on the railing.
The two hide behind a crate full of wood glue and tablecloths and listen to the man talking to himself. {0.SimFirstName} hears him cry something about his revenge being almost complete. Uh oh. That doesn't sound good.
Suddenly, something rises out of the crate in front of them, and it's all {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} can do to not shout. It's the ghost! The ethereal hound seems friendly though, and gestures at the crate, then at the old man. {0.SimFirstName} nods, knowing what to do.

String.Source:
{0.SimFirstName} looks at the young man and suddenly recognizes him. "You're Charlie Crabcakes!" {M0.he}{F0.she} shouts. "Heir to the Crabcakes fortune."
"Yes," spits Charlie, "though not much of a fortune after the Brindleton Wreck where my dad's ship lost a year's supply of crabs! All because of that stupid Mr. Friendly and his sick dog." The ghost dog looks indignant and floats a few paces away.
"I was going to turn the lighthouse off, make the big fish shipment crash, and Brindleton Bay was sure to give crabs another chance! And I would have gotten away with it, too, if hadn't been for these two meddling dogs!"
"But...why the mask?" asks {0.SimFirstName}. Charlie wrenches himself away from {1.SimFirstName}, ditches his shoes, and hops to the edge of the lighthouse.
"I've got tons of masks!" he shouts, adding "and I'll get my revenge! You'll see." He jumps and {0.SimFirstName} gasps, but Charlie spreads his arms and he has some kind of glider jacket that catches the wind, as he disappears into the darkness of the water below.
It's not really an answer, and {0.SimFirstName} is still confused, but it seems that they've done their good deed for the moment and made a new ghostly friend. The ghost dog licks {0.SimFirstName}'s face - which, for the record, feels super weird but also comforting - then disappears down into the heart of the lighthouse.
{0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} head home, content.

"Yes," spits Charlie, "though not much of a fortune after the Brindleton Wreck where my dad's ship lost a year's supply of crabs! All because of that stupid Mr. Friendly and his sick dog." The ghost dog looks indignant and floats a few paces away.

It's not really an answer, and {0.SimFirstName} is still confused, but it seems that they've done their good deed for the moment and made a new ghostly friend. The ghost dog licks {0.SimFirstName}'s face - which, for the record, feels super weird but also comforting - then disappears down into the heart of the lighthouse.

String.Source:
The two head to the office. Inside, the ghost is lounging in the corner. It sees {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} and jumps up in excitement.
The two dogs - one of this world, the other from beyond - skitter across the small office for a time, as {0.SimFirstName} reads some stories of Brindleton past.
After some time, the two head home, promising the ghost that they'll return again soon.

String.Source:
Though {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} search high and low, there's no ghostly dog to play with today.
They do notice a few more scratches and dog food crumbs around the lighthouse. {1.SimFirstName} is too busy munching on the crumbs to notice, but {0.SimFirstName} swears that he hears a slight echo of a howl as they head for home.

String.Source:
As {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} reach the top of the lighthouse, they see the ghost swooping in and out of the light. {1.SimFirstName} barks and the ghost notices them and floats down to play.
{1.SimFirstName} chases the ghost - or is the other way around? - in a circle around the light, while {0.SimFirstName} enjoys some of the best views of the bay.
After some time, {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} head back home, promising the ghost that they'll return again soon.

{1.SimFirstName} chases the ghost - or is the other way around? - in a circle around the light, while {0.SimFirstName} enjoys some of the best views of the bay.
After some time, {0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} head back home, promising the ghost that they'll return again soon.
Regular Stairs
Private Area

String.Source:
{0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} find themselves back at the Brindleton Light.
The two look up at it, then at each other, remembering the odd adventure they had there not too long ago. "Come on," {0.SimFirstName} says to {1.SimFirstName}. "Let's go see if our dog pal from beyond is around."
The shop is empty today, though there are now a revolving group of volunteers who help run it. {1.SimFirstName} paws gently at the Private door, before walking over and looking up the regular stairs.
String.Dest:
{0.SimFirstName} and {1.SimFirstName} find themselves back at the Brindleton Light.
The two look up at it, then at each other, remembering the odd adventure they had there not too long ago. "Come on," {0.SimFirstName} says to {1.SimFirstName}. "Let's go see if our dog pal from beyond is around."
The shop is empty today, though there are now a revolving group of volunteers who help run it. {1.SimFirstName} paws gently at the Private door, before walking over and looking up the regular stairs.
The Market
The Shoals
The Harbor

String.Source:
{0.SimFirstName} doesn't need {1.SimFirstName} to be drawn to the docks. Laughs from the regulars at The Salty Paw mix with the caws of gulls resting on the shoals. {0.SimFirstName} watches a group of them fly up and across the sails of boats docked at the harbor.
{0.SimFirstName} has {M0.his}{F0.her} pick of places to go.
String.Dest:
{0.SimFirstName} doesn't need {1.SimFirstName} to be drawn to the docks. Laughs from the regulars at The Salty Paw mix with the caws of gulls resting on the shoals. {0.SimFirstName} watches a group of them fly up and across the sails of boats docked at the harbor.
{0.SimFirstName} has {M0.his}{F0.her} pick of places to go.

String.Source:
{1.SimFirstName} takes the lead, dashing after the black figure, with {0.SimFirstName} not far behind. Salt-crusted wooden crates tower increasingly higher above them, until the horizon is lost. At the darkest corner, {1.SimFirstName} stops and turns {M1.his}{F1.her} head straight up. Above, a black cat with large yellow eyes is perched on the edge of the crate, watching them like a falcon. Is this what they've been chasing?
{0.SimFirstName} approaches carefully. {M0.He}{F0.She} inches forward, until {M0.he}{F0.she} is close enough to touch it. But {1.SimFirstName} cannot bear the anticipation any longer and barks in protest. The black cat disappears into the crates. {1.SimFirstName} keeps barking at the shadows, but {0.SimFirstName} knows it's gone. "Forget it {1.SimFirstName}, it's Whiskerman's Wharf."
String.Dest:

String.Source:
{0.SimFirstName} looks down at {M0.his}{F0.her} dog, so eager to follow the figure into the crates. Together, they've run past the entire market tracking it down. "Is what we want really at the end of the trail?" ponders {0.SimFirstName}.
{0.SimFirstName} ends {M0.his}{F0.her} trip sitting on a patio of the Salty Paw overlooking the sea. Soon {0.SimFirstName}, the bartender and twelve bearded fishermen are singing sea shanties. {1.SimFirstName} howls along in tune.

{0.SimFirstName} looks down at {M0.his}{F0.her} dog, so eager to follow the figure into the crates. Together, they've run past the entire market tracking it down. "Is what we want really at the end of the trail?" ponders {0.SimFirstName}.
{0.SimFirstName} ends {M0.his}{F0.her} trip sitting on a patio of the Salty Paw overlooking the sea. Soon {0.SimFirstName}, the bartender and twelve bearded fishermen are singing sea shanties. {1.SimFirstName} howls along in tune.
ร้านนั่งเล่น สี่ขาริมทะเล
The Crates

String.Source:
As promised, they return to the pier. A regular at the Salty Paw recognizes {0.SimFirstName} and waves. He calls {0.SimFirstName} over. Meanwhile, {1.SimFirstName} has picked up {M1.his}{F1.her} trail. A dark blur dashes into towering crates at the unloading dock, and {1.SimFirstName} barks wildly after it.
Where should they go?
String.Dest:
As promised, they return to the pier. A regular at the Salty Paw recognizes {0.SimFirstName} and waves. He calls {0.SimFirstName} over. Meanwhile, {1.SimFirstName} has picked up {M1.his}{F1.her} trail. A dark blur dashes into towering crates at the unloading dock, and {1.SimFirstName} barks wildly after it.
Where should they go?
ท่าเรือท่านหนวดแมว

String.Source:
The crowded marketplace is packed with sights and smells. But {1.SimFirstName} is interested in only one. {M1.He}{F1.She} darts between barrels of fish and over cobblestone streets in pursuit of the scent. {0.SimFirstName} just tries to keep up.
Finally, they stop on a balcony overlooking the sea. {1.SimFirstName}'s trail has gone cold. {0.SimFirstName} pats {1.SimFirstName}, trying to cheer {M1.him}{F1.her} up. Next time, they'll return.
String.Dest:
The crowded marketplace is packed with sights and smells. But {1.SimFirstName} is interested in only one. {M1.He}{F1.She} darts between barrels of fish and over cobblestone streets in pursuit of the scent. {0.SimFirstName} just tries to keep up.
Finally, they stop on a balcony overlooking the sea. {1.SimFirstName}'s trail has gone cold. {0.SimFirstName} pats {1.SimFirstName}, trying to cheer {M1.him}{F1.her} up. Next time, they'll return.

String.Source:
{0.SimFirstName} takes three ginger steps onto the deck and knocks on the door. "Who's there?" cries a voice from inside. {0.SimFirstName} takes a step back as the door opens to reveal an old woman with silvery hair swept up in a bun on her head. She's wearing horn-rimmed glasses and a long floral pink dress. "No solicitors!"
Before {0.SimFirstName} can respond, {1.SimFirstName} runs past both of them in through the cabin doors. "What's this!" she yells. "Get your animal off my skipper!" But just as quickly, {1.SimFirstName} comes running back out carrying a cardboard bag of what smells like fish. {M1.He}{F1.She} darts through the woman's legs, off the boat, and back up the harbor. {0.SimFirstName}'s dog has just committed robbery, so {M0.he}{F0.she} decides it's a good time to leave. As {1.SimFirstName} and {0.SimFirstName} head home, "My Trout!" echo in the distance.
String.Dest:
{0.SimFirstName} takes three ginger steps onto the deck and knocks on the door. "Who's there?" cries a voice from inside. {0.SimFirstName} takes a step back as the door opens to reveal an old woman with silvery hair swept up in a bun on her head. She's wearing horn-rimmed glasses and a long floral pink dress. "No solicitors!"
Before {0.SimFirstName} can respond, {1.SimFirstName} runs past both of them in through the cabin doors. "What's this!" she yells. "Get your animal off my skipper!" But just as quickly, {1.SimFirstName} comes running back out carrying a cardboard bag of what smells like fish. {M1.He}{F1.She} darts through the woman's legs, off the boat, and back up the harbor. {0.SimFirstName}'s dog has just committed robbery, so {M0.he}{F0.she} decides it's a good time to leave. As {1.SimFirstName} and {0.SimFirstName} head home, "My Trout!" echo in the distance.

String.Source:
{0.SimFirstName} doesn't want to take any chances, and decides to look through the window first. {1.SimFirstName} is right at {M0.his}{F0.her} feet, and gets to the window first. On seeing what's inside, {1.SimFirstName}'s hairs raise and begins to growl. What could be inside? The cabin is so low that {0.SimFirstName} has to bend down to get a look.
Two green eyes and a set of whiskers are staring back at {0.SimFirstName}. A cat wearing a sailor's hat is standing with two hind legs on the driver's seat and two paws on the helm. It blinks, staring at {0.SimFirstName} blankly.
Outside, {0.SimFirstName} hears the propeller start and the boat begins to back away from the dock. Tearing {1.SimFirstName} away from the absurd scene, they both get off the boat. It sails away, cruising into the horizon.
String.Dest:

On seeing what's inside, {1.SimFirstName}'s hairs raise and begins to growl. What could be inside? The cabin is so low that {0.SimFirstName} has to bend down to get a look.

Outside, {0.SimFirstName} hears the propeller start and the boat begins to back away from the dock. Tearing {1.SimFirstName} away from the absurd scene, they both get off the boat. It sails away, cruising into the horizon.
เคาะประตู
มองจากทางหน้าต่าง

String.Source:
They return to the harbor, and pick up the trail where {1.SimFirstName} left it. Only this time, there's something there.
{0.SimFirstName} walks them down the harbor to the last boat on the dock. It is a tiny blue and white skipper with "Old Lady Sea" written in black across the bow. A tiny door to the cabin is just across the deck, as is a small window. Knocking would be polite, but taking a peak through the window might give {0.SimFirstName} more of an idea what {1.SimFirstName} was chasing after.
String.Dest:
They return to the harbor, and pick up the trail where {1.SimFirstName} left it. Only this time, there's something there.
{0.SimFirstName} walks them down the harbor to the last boat on the dock. It is a tiny blue and white skipper with "Old Lady Sea" written in black across the bow. A tiny door to the cabin is just across the deck, as is a small window. Knocking would be polite, but taking a peak through the window might give {0.SimFirstName} more of an idea what {1.SimFirstName} was chasing after.

String.Source:
{1.SimFirstName} leads them on a trail down the windswept hills into the wide open harbor of Whiskerman's Wharf. Schooners and skippers docked in soft rows bob gently with the tide. {0.SimFirstName} admires the scene, but {1.SimFirstName}'s nose is to the ground. {M1.His}{F1.Her} focus is entirely on the fresh scent of a trail. {0.SimFirstName} follows {M1.him}{F1.her} through the docks.
Finally, {1.SimFirstName} stops at a wooden dock, but whatever boat was there is gone. The trail's gone cold. {0.SimFirstName} promises they'll return next time.
String.Dest:
{1.SimFirstName} leads them on a trail down the windswept hills into the wide open harbor of Whiskerman's Wharf. Schooners and skippers docked in soft rows bob gently with the tide. {0.SimFirstName} admires the scene, but {1.SimFirstName}'s nose is to the ground. {M1.His}{F1.Her} focus is entirely on the fresh scent of a trail. {0.SimFirstName} follows {M1.him}{F1.her} through the docks.
Finally, {1.SimFirstName} stops at a wooden dock, but whatever boat was there is gone. The trail's gone cold. {0.SimFirstName} promises they'll return next time.

String.Source:
There's no telling what sharp rocks lies beneath the dark water's surface, and {0.SimFirstName} just isn't willing to take that chance. Time slows down as {0.SimFirstName} launches forward and grabs {1.SimFirstName} around the middle just as {M1.he}{F1.she} is mid leap. It is an act of gravity-defying athleticism that you'd have to see to believe.
{0.SimFirstName} is sure to spend the rest of the week reliving how {M0.he}{F0.she} saved {M0.his}{F0.her} dog from the rocky depths in a mid-air rescue. {0.SimFirstName} returns home with a confidence boost.
String.Dest:
There's no telling what sharp rocks lies beneath the dark water's surface, and {0.SimFirstName} just isn't willing to take that chance. Time slows down as {0.SimFirstName} launches forward and grabs {1.SimFirstName} around the middle just as {M1.he}{F1.she} is mid leap. It is an act of gravity-defying athleticism that you'd have to see to believe.
{0.SimFirstName} is sure to spend the rest of the week reliving how {M0.he}{F0.she} saved {M0.his}{F0.her} dog from the rocky depths in a mid-air rescue. {0.SimFirstName} returns home with a confidence boost.

String.Source:
{0.SimFirstName} recoils from the large splash after {1.SimFirstName} makes the jump. As {M0.he}{F0.she} rubs salt water from {M0.his}{F0.her} eyes, {0.SimFirstName} bends over the rock to try and locate {M0.his}{F0.her} adventurous animal, who has disappeared beneath the water. {1.SimFirstName} is nowhere to be seen.
Desperately, {0.SimFirstName} scans the water's surface. A dark blur moves just a few feet in front of {M0.him}{F0.her}. {M0.He}{F0.She} sighs in relief as it makes its way towards {M0.him}{F0.her}. {M0.He}{F0.She} reaches out {M0.his}{F0.her} hand to help {1.SimFirstName} back up, but instantly draws it back when a furless, wire-whiskered head appears in {1.SimFirstName}'s place. It's a sea lion!
{1.SimFirstName} pops {M1.his}{F1.her} head out of the water soon after. It appears the two have an accord. {0.SimFirstName} helps {1.SimFirstName} back up the shoals, and they say goodbye to their friend for today.
String.Dest:
{0.SimFirstName} recoils from the large splash after {1.SimFirstName} makes the jump. It's a sea lion!
{1.SimFirstName} pops {M1.his}{F1.her} head out of the water soon after. It appears the two have an accord. {0.SimFirstName} helps {1.SimFirstName} back up the shoals, and they say goodbye to their friend for today.
Keep {M1.Him}{F1.Her} Back
แบบลูกปืน

String.Source:
As promised, {1.SimFirstName} is returned to {M1.his}{F1.her} trail along the shoals. {1.SimFirstName} picks up right where {M1.he}{F1.she} left off, racing among the rocky crags tracking a scent.
On a particularly high rock on the water's edge, {1.SimFirstName} stops. {M1.His}{F1.Her} eyes lock on something in the sea. More worrisome to {0.SimFirstName}, {M1.he}{F1.she} looks like {M1.he's}{F1.she's} about to jump.
Should {0.SimFirstName} let {1.SimFirstName} jump or encourage him to stay on the surface?
String.Dest:
As promised, {1.SimFirstName} is returned to {M1.his}{F1.her} trail along the shoals. {1.SimFirstName} picks up right where {M1.he}{F1.she} left off, racing among the rocky crags tracking a scent.
On a particularly high rock on the water's edge, {1.SimFirstName} stops. {M1.His}{F1.Her} eyes lock on something in the sea. More worrisome to {0.SimFirstName}, {M1.he}{F1.she} looks like {M1.he's}{F1.she's} about to jump.
Should {0.SimFirstName} let {1.SimFirstName} jump or encourage him to stay on the surface?

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} in fact has no choice at all. Instead, {M0.he}{F0.she} is pulled forward as {1.SimFirstName} races after a scent in the deep shoals. They spend their time climbing over tidepools and between jagged rocks. {1.SimFirstName} wants to stay and keep searching, but {0.SimFirstName} takes them home. Next time, they'll return.
String.Dest: จริงๆ แล้ว {0.SimFirstName} แทบไม่มีโอกาสได้ตัดสินใจด้วยซ้ำ เพราะ{M0.เขา}{F0.เธอ}ถูกฉุดกระฉากทันทีที่ {1.SimFirstName} ออกวิ่งตามกลิ่นที่โชยมาจากหาดลึกไป โดยน้องได้ใช้เวลาไปกับการปีนป่ายโขดหินต่างๆ มากมาย ใจจริง {1.SimFirstName} ก็อยากจะอยู่สืบเสาะที่นั่นต่อแหละนะ แต่ว่า {0.SimFirstName} ดันพาตัวกลับบ้านเสียก่อน รับรองเลยว่าน้องจะหาทางกลับมาที่นี่ให้ได้อีก

String.Source: On {0.SimFirstName}’s ok, {1.SimFirstName} takes off. The path looks to be going to the old Brindleton Bay Lighthouse. There are rumors around town of a malicious ghost dog that haunts the bay. Old Lady Crabtree says he can be found late at night, howling from the top of the tower. "I’m sure it’s just superstition," {0.SimFirstName} thinks.
String.Dest: เมื่อ {0.SimFirstName} ตกลงแล้ว {1.SimFirstName} ก็ออกตัวในทันที เส้นทางนั้นเหมือนว่าจะนำไปสู่ประภาคารเก่าแก่ประจำอ่าวบรินเดิลตันนะ ในเมืองเขาลือกันให้ทั่วเลยว่ามีผีสุนัขตัวหนึ่งออกหลอกหลอนไปทั่วทั้งอ่าว สตรีแก่นามว่า 'แคร็บทรี' เล่าว่าน้องจะออกมาปรากฏตัวให้เห็นตอนดึกๆ พร้อมกับส่งเสียงหอนลงมาจากด้านบนสุดของอาคาร {0.SimFirstName} ได้ยินดังนั้นจึงคิดในใจว่า "ก็แค่เรื่องงมงายแหละน่า"
Onward!

String.Source: It's time for an adventure. {1.SimFirstName} sniffs the air, picking up three distinct paths. Distracted by scents in all directions, {1.SimFirstName} needs some help deciding. Which way should {0.SimFirstName} take them?
String.Dest: ได้เวลาออกผจญภัยกันแล้ว {1.SimFirstName} สูดจมูกดังฟุดฟิดใหญ่ เมื่อถึงคราวต้องเลือกทางๆ หนึ่งจากทั้งหมดสามทาง กลิ่นที่โชยมาก็ยิ่งทำให้ {1.SimFirstName} รู้สึกลังเลและต้องการคนช่วยตัดสินใจ {0.SimFirstName} ควรจะพาน้องไปทางไหนดีล่ะ?
จัตุรัสกลางเมือง
ท่าเรือท่านหนวดแมว
ประภาคาร
การผจญภัยรออยู่ข้างหน้า!

String.Source:
{0.SimFirstName} has grown from a kitten into an adult cat!
{M0.He}{F0.She} will now climb stairs, as well as hopping onto and resting on higher flat surfaces. {M0.He}{F0.She} can also mate with other cats if {M0.he}{F0.she} isn't {M0.neutered}{F0.spayed}.
Hooray for {0.SimFirstName}!

{0.SimFirstName} has passed {M0.his}{F0.her} peak and has become an elderly cat now.
You may notice {M0.him}{F0.her} sleeping more often, jumping onto things less, and being more likely to get sick. {0.SimFirstName} still has some good days left, though, so spend some time with {M0.him}{F0.her} before it's time to say goodbye!
String.Dest:
{0.SimFirstName} ได้ผ่านช่วงเวลาสุดแสบและเข้าสู่แมววัยผู้ใหญ่แล้ว
คุณอาจพบว่า{0.SimPronounSubjective}จะนอนหลับบ่อยขึ้น กระโจนใส่สิ่งของน้อยลง และมักมีอาการป่วยอยู่บ่อยๆ {0.SimFirstName} ยังมีวันเวลาดีๆ เหลืออยู่บ้าง ฉะนั้นใช้เวลากับ{0.SimPronounObjective}ให้เต็มที่ก่อนจะถึงเวลาต้องจากกันไกล!

String.Source:
{0.SimFirstName} has grown from a puppy to an adult dog!
{M0.He}{F0.She} can now swim, climb stairs, go for walks, and start learning tricks. If not {M0.neutered}{F0.spayed}, {M0.he}{F0.she} can now mate with other dogs.
Hooray for {0.SimFirstName}!
String.Dest:
{0.SimFirstName} ได้เติบโตจากลูกสุนัขกลายเป็นสุนัขวัยรุ่นแล้ว!
ตอนนี้น้องสามารถว่ายน้ำ ขึ้นบันได ออกไปเดินเล่น และเริ่มเรียนรู้ทักษะพิเศษได้แล้ว หากไม่ได้{M0.ทำหมัน}{F0.ตัดรังไข่} น้องก็สามารถไปผสมพันธุ์กับสุนัขตัวอื่นได้
ร้องเฮให้ {0.SimFirstName} หน่อย!

ตรวจร่างกาย

String.Source: A vet will be with you soon to examine and treat your sick pet. Please be patient!
